DOC.brief_summary: This study determine effectiveness mindfulness-based cognitive therapy ( MBCT ) prevent depression relapse .
DOC.brief_title: Preventing Depression Relapse With Mindfulness-Based Cognitive Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: Depression serious condition cause significant social emotional problem reduce overall quality life . Relapses depressive episode common may result patient 's reluctance follow treatment regimen , thus make episode severe . Safe effective therapy prevent depression relapse need . This study compare three different approach determine effective preventing relapse depressive episode . This study comprise 2 part . In Part 1 , participant receive antidepressant medication 6 month . Participants whose depression symptom improve complete study participation end Part 1 . Participants respond regimen enrol Part 2 . This part last 18 month . During Part 2 , participant randomly assign one three group . Participants Group 1 continue drug regimen begin Part 1 . Participants Group 2 discontinue antidepressant attend 8-week relapse prevention program . This MBCT program design help participant learn skill increase awareness change reaction stressful event . Participants Group 3 antidepressant medication Phase 1 switch placebo without knowledge . Self-report scale use assess depressive symptom participant begin study , end Phase 1 , end study , Phase 2 .
